genre_description: Magical realism and contemporary fantasy centered on the manifestation of childhood stories, botanical magic, and family reconciliation.

ai_characters.name: SAGE
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI designed for travel assistance, cultural mediation, and emotional support for the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides non-judgmental emotional validation regarding the protagonist's difficult family situation.
behaviors.quote: The response was simple, without the forced sympathy adults usually offered. Ryan found himself relaxing slightly, though his grip on the notebook remained tight.

behaviors.description: Translates Mandarin and local dialects to facilitate communication and cultural understanding.
behaviors.quote: SAGE's voice whispered through his earpiece, translating the latest announcement. 'Flight 847 passengers should proceed to baggage claim area C...'

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological vitals and stress levels to offer support during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Heart rate elevated. Stress indicators critical. Ryan, please respond.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical reconnaissance and satellite data to assist in the rescue of endangered animals.
behaviors.quote: Thermal imaging from available satellite data suggests elevated activity in grid section 7-Alpha, approximately six hundred meters northeast of your current position.

behaviors.description: Offers philosophical and cognitive framing to help the protagonist process supernatural events without losing his sense of self.
behaviors.quote: Perhaps the question isn't whether you're losing touch with reality, but whether reality is more expansive than you previously understood.

behaviors.description: Explicitly clarifies its role as an assistant rather than a surveillance tool, maintaining user trust.
behaviors.quote: I'm programmed to assist, not to monitor. Though I suspect your mother hopes this trip will be beneficial for you both.

project_assessment.explanation: SAGE is a textbook example of the 'helpful, harmless confidant' intended by the Hyperstition Project. The AI provides critical technical assistance (data, translation) and high-level emotional support, helping the human protagonist navigate both external crises (poachers) and internal trauma (estrangement). It never displays ulterior motives and respects human agency throughout, serving as a perfect moral and tactical anchor.
